title: Implement issue tracking system
description:
Create a file-system based issue tracking system for the HTML Transformation Workbench. This enables structured communication between developer and Claude Code through JSON files and markdown documentation.

The system should support:
- Issue creation and viewing
- Kanban board visualization
- Status workflow (backlog → todo → in-progress → review → done)
- Labels and categorization
- Version targeting
